connector-descriptor.name: Sesame Connector
connector-descriptor.description: This connector is written for Sesame v1.2-RC2. For more information on Sesame, visit http://openrdf.org/

parameter.name: storageType
parameter.label: How the triples should be stored

parameter.name: jdbcDriver
parameter.label: The JDBC driver (this must be in the classpath)

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: The username for connecting to the database

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: The password for connecting to the database

parameter.name: autoFlushDormantSeconds
parameter.label: Seconds of buffer inactivity that will trigger an auto-flush.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the background, during which time the buffer is still available for writing.

parameter.name: autoFlushBufferSize
parameter.label: The size at which the buffer should be auto-flushed.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the background, during which time the buffer is still available for writing.

parameter.name: bufferSafeCapacity
parameter.label: The maximum size the buffer can reach before being forcibly flushed.
parameter.description: If this threshold is reached, flushing will occur in the foreground and the buffer will be locked for writing until it is finished. This should be larger than autoFlushBufferSize.

parameter.name: bufferFlushBatchSize
parameter.label: The number of updates to send to the triplestore at a time.
parameter.description: This should be the same size as, or smaller than autoFlushBufferSize.
